languages.text: "Они прячутся среди нормальных людей, среди черни, среди проповедников. Коррумпируют все новые группы. Молятся своему нечестивому идолу, коего часто зовут Многоруким Императором. Расширяют семьи и рожают потомство — сначала ужасное, но с каждым поколением все более похожее на обычных людей. А затем восстают".

"These things pass themselves off as ordinary people, as rabble or preachers, corrupting new groups. They pray to their unholy idol, which they often refer to as the Many-Armed Emperor. They create ever-growing families and produce offspring — hideous at first, but with each new generation, more and more human in appearance. And then, they rise up."
languages.original_text: "Они прячутся среди нормальных людей, среди черни, среди проповедников. Коррумпируют все новые группы. Молятся своему нечестивому идолу, коего часто зовут Многоруким Императором. Расширяют семьи и рожают потомство — сначала ужасное, но с каждым поколением все более похожее на обычных людей. А затем восстают".

They create ever-growing families and produce offspring — hideous at first, but with each new generation, more and more human in appearance. And then, they rise up."

languages.text: “这些人会伪装成普通人的样子，有可能伪装成乌合之众，也可能会伪装成布道士，负责腐蚀新的群体。他们会向邪恶的神明祈祷，而他们通常称这位神明为‘四臂神皇’。这些怪物的族群不断扩张，还会繁育新的后代。一开始，他们的后代会非常丑陋，但随着不断繁衍，怪物的后代也会与人类越来越相像。而在这之后，他们就会发起叛乱。”
languages.original_text: "These things pass themselves off as ordinary people, as rabble or preachers, corrupting new groups. They pray to their unholy idol, which they often refer to as the Many-Armed Emperor. They create ever-growing families and produce offspring — hideous at first, but with each new generation, more and more human in appearance. And then, they rise up."

traits.locale_text: “这些人会伪装成普通人的样子，有可能伪装成乌合之众，也可能会伪装成布道士，负责腐蚀新的群体。他们会向邪恶的神明祈祷，而他们通常称这位神明为‘四臂神皇’。这些怪物的族群不断扩张，还会繁育新的后代。一开始，他们的后代会非常丑陋，但随着不断繁衍，怪物的后代也会与人类越来越相像。而在这之后，他们就会发起叛乱。”

languages.text: «Estos seres se hacen pasar por gente corriente, plebeyos o predicadores, para corromper nuevos grupos. Rezan a su impío ídolo, al que suelen referirse como el Emperador de Múltiples Brazos. Crean familias numerosas y producen mucha descendencia que de primeras parecen aberraciones, pero con cada generación adquieren un aspecto cada vez más humano. Hasta que por fin se rebelan».
languages.original_text: "These things pass themselves off as ordinary people, as rabble or preachers, corrupting new groups. They pray to their unholy idol, which they often refer to as the Many-Armed Emperor. They create ever-growing families and produce offspring — hideous at first, but with each new generation, more and more human in appearance. And then, they rise up."

traits.locale_text: «Estos seres se hacen pasar por gente corriente, plebeyos o predicadores, para corromper nuevos grupos. Rezan a su impío ídolo, al que suelen referirse como el Emperador de Múltiples Brazos. Crean familias numerosas y producen mucha descendencia que de primeras parecen aberraciones, pero con cada generación adquieren un aspecto cada vez más humano. Hasta que por fin se rebelan».

languages.text: 「彼らは自分たちを普通の人々、狂信者またはプリーチャーとして自分自身を偽装し、人々をを堕落させます。彼らは不浄の偶像に祈りを捧げますが、その偶像は多腕の皇帝と呼ばれます。さらに家族を増やし続け、子孫を残す。最初は醜悪ですが、新しい世代が生まれるたびに、より人間らしい外見になっていく。そして、彼らはついに暴れだすのです」
languages.original_text: "These things pass themselves off as ordinary people, as rabble or preachers, corrupting new groups. They pray to their unholy idol, which they often refer to as the Many-Armed Emperor. They create ever-growing families and produce offspring — hideous at first, but with each new generation, more and more human in appearance. And then, they rise up."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは自分たちを普通の人々、狂信者またはプリーチャーとして自分自身を偽装し、人々をを堕落させます。彼らは不浄の偶像に祈りを捧げますが、その偶像は多腕の皇帝と呼ばれます。さらに家族を増やし続け、子孫を残す。最初は醜悪ですが、新しい世代が生まれるたびに、より人間らしい外見になっていく。そして、彼らはついに暴れだすのです」

languages.text: "Diese Dinge gehen als normale Leute durch, Abschaum oder Prediger, die neue Gruppen verderben. Sie beten zu ihrem unheiligen Götzen, den sie häufig als vielarmigen Imperator bezeichnen. Sie bilden ständig wachsende Familien und produzieren Nachkommen ... abscheuliche Nachkommen zunächst, deren Erscheinungsbild von Generation zu Generation menschlicher wird. Und dann erheben sie sich."
languages.original_text: "These things pass themselves off as ordinary people, as rabble or preachers, corrupting new groups. They pray to their unholy idol, which they often refer to as the Many-Armed Emperor. They create ever-growing families and produce offspring — hideous at first, but with each new generation, more and more human in appearance. And then, they rise up."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Dinge gehen als normale Leute durch, Abschaum oder Prediger, die neue Gruppen verderben. Sie beten zu ihrem unheiligen Götzen, den sie häufig als vielarmigen Imperator bezeichnen. Sie bilden ständig wachsende Familien und produzieren Nachkommen ... abscheuliche Nachkommen zunächst, deren Erscheinungsbild von Generation zu Generation menschlicher wird. Und dann erheben sie sich."

languages.text: « Ces horreurs se font passer pour des gens ordinaires, simples ouvriers ou prêcheurs, pour mieux corrompre de nouveaux groupes. Ils vénèrent leur idole impie, souvent surnommée l'Empereur aux mille bras, fondent des familles qui se reproduisent telle une épidémie galopante et engendrent moult rejetons. S'ils sont absolument hideux au départ, ces derniers prennent au fil des générations une apparence de plus en plus humaine. Jusqu'au jour où ils tombent le masque et se soulèvent. »
languages.original_text: "These things pass themselves off as ordinary people, as rabble or preachers, corrupting new groups. They pray to their unholy idol, which they often refer to as the Many-Armed Emperor. They create ever-growing families and produce offspring — hideous at first, but with each new generation, more and more human in appearance. And then, they rise up."

traits.locale_text: « Ces horreurs se font passer pour des gens ordinaires, simples ouvriers ou prédicateurs, pour mieux corrompre de nouveaux groupes. Ils vénèrent leur idole impie, souvent surnommée l'Empereur aux mille bras, fondent des familles qui se reproduisent telle une épidémie galopante et engendrent moult rejetons. S'ils sont absolument hideux au départ, ces derniers prennent au fil des générations une apparence de plus en plus humaine. Jusqu'au jour où ils tombent le masque et se soulèvent. »

languages.text: "Bu şeyler, kendilerini sıradan insanlar gibi satar. Ayaktakımı ya da vaizler arasında yer alarak yeni grupları yozlaştırırlar. Sıklıkla Çok Kollu İmparator olarak adlandırdıkları uğursuz mabutlarına dua ederler. Sürekli büyüyen aileler kurup çocuk yaparlar. En başta iğrenç görünseler de her yeni nesille birlikte görünümleri gittikçe daha da insanı andırır. Ardından da ayaklanırlar."
languages.original_text: "These things pass themselves off as ordinary people, as rabble or preachers, corrupting new groups. They pray to their unholy idol, which they often refer to as the Many-Armed Emperor. They create ever-growing families and produce offspring — hideous at first, but with each new generation, more and more human in appearance. And then, they rise up."
